game_description: CAT IS BACK TO MAKE ANOTHER MESS! BUT THIS TIME, IT'LL BE YOUR BLOOD. FIND ALL 6 ITEMS, THEN GO INTO THE PENTAGRAM TO BANISH CAT BACK INTO THE BOX. CAT WILL APPEAR AFTER FINDING THE FIRST ITEM AND WILL GET FASTER THE MORE YOU FIND. DON'T LET HIM CATCH YOU!

review_2: The game is graphically ok, however it is not scary at all to anyone who has played vr horror games for more than a week. The speed of the cat that catches up to you increases as you progress, however after you get the final object it becomes faster than you, making it a luck game. No fun after more than three attempts.
review_3: when i first played this i was scared outta my mind and i still am, the cat death screen is terrifying as hell, also a suggestion can you add multiplayer i would love to play with different players collecting.
